snippet: Shares in Restoration Hardware opened up at $32.28, more than 35 percent higher than their initial offer price, as investors' appetite for the stock appeared undiminished by the storm-shortened week.
abstract: Shares in Restoration Hardware opened up at $32.28, more than 35 percent higher than their initial offer price, as investors' appetite for the stock appeared undiminished by the storm-shortened week.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Restoration Hardware Jumps in Market Debut
headline.print_headline: Strong Opening For Shares In Restoration Hardware
